sentences.sContent: The diocese does not deny the copying, but says he probably did not know of the reassignment.
sentences.sContent_eng: The diocese does not deny the copying, but says he probably did not know of the reassignment.
sentences.sCn: 主教教区没有否认那个记录但是表示它或许对于重新任职一无所知。

sentences.sContent: A British bishop has already advised his diocese to suspend holy water from churches in a bid to halt the spread of the A(H1N1) virus.
sentences.sContent_eng: A British bishop has already advised his diocese to suspend holy water from churches in a bid to halt the spread of the A(H1N1) virus.
sentences.sCn: 一位英国主教已经建议他主管教区的教堂暂停供应圣水，从而防止甲型H1N1流感病毒的传播。

trans.tranOther: the area under the control of a  bishop  in some Christian churches
